ItemType.description: Represents a single item found in search results. It contains some metadata about the item found along with the UMM representing the item. umm won't be present if the item represents a tombstone.

MetaType.description: CMR level metadata about the item found. This represents data not found in the actual metadata.

provider-id.description: The identity of the provider in the CMR

native-id.description: The id used by the provider to identify this item during ingest.

concept-id.description: The concept id of the item found.

revision-id.description: A number >= 1 that indicates which revision of the item.

revision-date.description: The date this revision was created. This would be the creation or update date of the item in the CMR.

user-id.description: The id of the user who created this item revision.

deleted.description: Indicates if the item represents a tombstone

format.description: The mime type of the original metadata

concept-id.description: The concept id of the item found.

revision-id.description: A number >= 1 that indicates which revision of the item.

ServiceOptionsType.description: This object describes service options, data transformations and output formats.

SubsetTypes.description: This element is used to identify the list of supported subsetting requests.

SupportedProjections.description: This element is used to identify the list of supported projections types.

InterpolationTypes.description: This element is used to identify the list of supported interpolation types.

SupportedFormats.description: This project element describes the list of names of the formats supported by the service.

SubsetTypeEnum.description: This element is used to identify the subset type of the variable.

ProjectionTypeEnum.description: This element is used to identify the projection type of the variable.
enum: NSIDC Sea Ice Polar Stereographic North
WGS 84 / NSIDC Sea Ice Polar Stereographic North
WGS 84 / North Pole LAEA Bering Sea
WGS 84 / Pseudo-Mercator -- Spherical Mercator, Google Maps, OpenStreetMap, Bing, ArcGIS, ESRI
Google Maps Global Mercator -- Spherical Mercator
NSIDC Sea Ice Polar Stereographic South
WGS 84 / NSIDC Sea Ice Polar Stereographic South

InterpolationTypeEnum.description: This element is used to identify the interpolation type of the variable.

FormatTypeEnum.description: This element contains a list of file formats supported by the service.

ServiceKeywordType.description: Enables specification of Earth science service keywords related to the service.  The Earth Science Service keywords are chosen from a controlled keyword hierarchy maintained in the Keyword Management System (KMS).

ServiceOrganizationType.description: Defines a service organization which is either an organization or institution responsible for distributing, archiving, or processing the data via a service, etc.

Roles.description: This is the roles of the service organization.

ShortName.description: This is the short name of the service organization.

LongName.description: This is the long name of the service organization.

ContactGroups.description: This is the contact groups of the service organization.

ContactPersons.description: This is the contact persons of the service organization.

ContactInformation.description: This is the contact information of the service organization.

Roles.description: This is the roles of the service contact.

NonServiceOrganizationAffiliation.description: This is the contact person or group that is not affiliated with the service organizations.

ContactInformation.description: This is the contact information of the service contact.

GroupName.description: This is the contact group name.

Roles.description: This is the roles of the service contact.

NonServiceOrganizationAffiliation.description: This is the contact person or group that is not affiliated with the service organization.

ContactInformation.description: This is the contact information of the service contact.

ContactInformationType.description: Defines the contact information of a service organization or service contact.

RelatedUrls.description: A URL associated with the contact, e.g., the home page for the service provider which is responsible for the service.

ServiceHours.description: Time period when the contact answers questions or provides services.

ContactInstruction.description: Supplemental instructions on how or when to contact the responsible party.

ContactMechanismType.description: Method for contacting the service contact. A contact can be available via phone, email, Facebook, or Twitter.

Type.description: This is the method type for contacting the responsible party - phone, email, Facebook, or Twitter.

Value.description: This is the contact phone number, email address, Facebook address, or Twitter handle associated with the contact method.

ServiceOrganizationShortNameType.description: The unique name of the service organization.

ServiceOrganizationRoleEnum.description: Defines the possible values of a service provider role.

LongNameType.description: The expanded or long name related to the short name.

ServiceTypeEnum.description: This element is used to identify the type of the service.

ServiceQualityType.description: This object describes service quality, composed of the quality flag, the quality flagging system, traceability and lineage.

QualityFlag.description: The quality flag for the service.

Traceability.description: The quality traceability of the service.

Lineage.description: The quality lineage of the service.

AccessConstraintsType.description: Information about any constraints for accessing the service, software, or tool.

UseConstraintsType.description: Information on how the item (service, software, or tool) may or may not be used after access is granted. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, terms and conditions, and/or limitations on using the item. Providers may request acknowledgement of the item from users and claim no responsibility for quality and completeness.

AncillaryKeywordsType.description: Words or phrases to further describe the service, software, or tool.

PlatformType.description: This element describes the platform information.

ShortName.description: The short name of the platform associated with the service.

LongName.description: The long name of the platform associated with the service.

Instruments.description: Associates the instrument/sensor that is supported by the service, software, or tool.

ShortName.description: The short name of the instrument associated with the service.

LongName.description: The long name of the instrument associated with the service.

ServiceContactRoleEnum.description: Defines the possible values of a service provider role.

ContactMechanismTypeEnum.description: Defines the possible contact mechanism types.

AddressType.description: This entity contains the physical address details for the contact.

StreetAddresses.description: An address line for the street address, used for mailing or physical addresses of organizations or individuals who serve as contacts for the service.

City.description: The city portion of the physical address.

StateProvince.description: The state or province portion of the physical address.

Country.description: The country of the physical address.

PostalCode.description: The zip or other postal code portion of the physical address.

CoordinatesType.description: The coordinates consist of a latitude and longitude.

LineStringType.description: The line string consists of two points: a start point and an end ppint.

StartPoint.description: The start point of the line string.

EndPoint.description: The end point of the line string.

BBoxType.description: The bounding box consists of min x, min y, max y and max y ordinates.

MinX.description: The minimum x ordinate of the bounding box.

MinY.description: The minimum x ordinate of the bounding box.

MaxX.description: The maximum y ordinate of the bounding box.

MaxY.description: The maximum y ordinate of the bounding box.

SpatialPoints.description: The spatial extent of the layer or coverage described by a point.

SpatialLineStrings.description: The spatial extent of the layer or coverage described by a line string.

SpatialBoundingBox.description: The spatial extent of the layer or coverage described by a bounding box.

SpatialPolygons.description: The spatial extent of the layer or coverage described by a polygon.

CoverageTimePoints.description: Points in time representing the temporal extent of the layer or coverage.

TimeFormat.description: Time format representing time point of the temporal extent.

TimeValue.description: Time value of the time point of temporal extent.

Description.description: Description of the time value of the temporal extent.

CoverageTypeEnum.description: This element is used to identify the coverage type, either: point, linestring, bounding box or polygon.

Name.description: The name of the coverage available from the service.

Type.description: The type of the coverage available from the service.

CoverageSpatialExtent.description: The spatial extent of the coverage available from the service. These are coordinate pairs which describe either the point, line string, or polygon representing the spatial extent. The bounding box is described by the west, south, east and north ordinates

SpatialResolution.description: The spatial resolution of the coverage available from the service.

SpatialResolutionUnit.description: The unit of the spatial resolution of the coverage available from the service.

CoverageTemporalExtent.description: The temporal extent of the coverage available from the service.

TemporalResolution.description: The temporal resolution of the coverage available from the service.

TemporalResolutionUnit.description: The unit of the temporal resolution of the coverage available from the service.

RelativePath.description: Path relative to the root universal resource locator for the coverage.

Name.description: The name of the service, software, or tool.

LongName.description: The long name of the service, software, or tool.

Type.description: The type of the service, software, or tool.

Version.description: The edition or version of the service, software, or tool.

Description.description: A brief description of the service.

RelatedURL.description: This element contains important information about the universal resource locator (URL) for the service.

OnlineAccessURLPatternMatch.description: A field needed for pattern matching in OPeNDAP services

OnlineAccessURLPatternSubstitution.description: A field needed for pattern substitution in OPeNDAP services

ScienceKeywords.description: Allows for the specification of Earth Science keywords that are representative of the service, software, or tool being described. The controlled vocabulary for Science Keywords is maintained in the Keyword Management System (KMS).

ServiceKeywords.description: Allows for the specification of Earth Science Service keywords that are representative of the service, software, or tool being described. The controlled vocabulary for Service Keywords is maintained in the Keyword Management System (KMS).

ServiceOrganizations.description: The service provider, or organization, or institution responsible for developing, archiving, and/or distributing the service, software, or tool.

ContactGroups.description: This is the contact groups of the service.

ContactPersons.description: This is the contact persons of the service.

Platforms.description: Associates the satellite/platform that is supported by the service, software, or tool.

ServiceQuality.description: Information about the quality of the service, software, or tool, or any quality assurance procedures followed in development.

AccessConstraints.description: Information about any constraints for accessing the service, software, or tool.

UseConstraints.description: Information on how the item (service, software, or tool) may or may not be used after access is granted. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, terms and conditions, and/or limitations on using the item. Providers may request acknowledgement of the item from users and claim no responsibility for quality and completeness.

AncillaryKeywords.description: Words or phrases to further describe the service, software, or tool.

ServiceOptions.description: This element contains important information about the Unique Resource Locator for the service.

Coverage.description: This element contains important information about the coverage for the service.

umm-s-json-schema.json_definitions_Proje.description: This element is used to identify the projection type of the variable.

The unique name of the service organization.

umm-s-json-schema.json_definitions_LongN.description: The expanded or long name related to the short name.

umm-cmn-json-schema.json_definitions_Uui.description: A Level 3 UUID, see wiki link http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Universally_unique_identifier#Version_4_.28random.29

Roles.description: This is the roles of the service contact.

NonServiceOrganizationAffiliation.description: This is the contact person or group that is not affiliated with the service organizations.

ContactInformation.description: This is the contact information of the service contact.

GroupName.description: This is the contact group name.

umm-s-json-schema.json_definitions_Conta.description: Defines the contact information of a service organization or service contact.

RelatedUrls.description: A URL associated with the contact, e.g., the home page for the service provider which is responsible for the service.

ServiceHours.description: Time period when the contact answers questions or provides services.

ContactInstruction.description: Supplemental instructions on how or when to contact the responsible party.

umm-cmn-json-schema.json_definitions_Rel.description: Represents Internet sites that contain information related to the data, as well as related Internet sites such as project home pages, related data archives/servers, metadata extensions, online software packages, web mapping services, and calibration/validation data.

Description.description: Description of the web page at this URL.

URLContentType.description: A keyword describing the distinct content type of the online resource to this resource. (e.g., 'DATACENTER URL', 'DATA CONTACT URL', 'DISTRIBUTION URL').

Type.description: A keyword describing the type of the online resource to this resource. This helps the GUI to know what to do with this resource. (e.g., 'GET DATA', 'GET SERVICE', 'GET VISUALIZATION').

Subtype.description: A keyword describing the subtype of the online resource to this resource. This further helps the GUI to know what to do with this resource. (e.g., 'MEDIA', 'BROWSE', 'OPENDAP', 'OPENSEARCH', 'WEB COVERAGE SERVICES', 'WEB FEATURE SERVICES', 'WEB MAPPING SERVICES', 'SSW', 'ESI').

URL.description: The URL for the relevant web page (e.g., the URL of the responsible organization's home page, the URL of the collection landing page, the URL of the download site for the collection).

GetData.description: The data distribution information for the relevant web page (e.g., browse, media).

GetService.description: The service distribution for the relevant web page (e.g., OPeNDAP, OpenSearch, WCS, WFS, WMS).

umm-cmn-json-schema.json_definitions_Get.description: Represents the information needed for a DistributionURL where data is retrieved.

Unit.description: Unit of information, together with Size determines total size in bytes of the data.

Fees.description: The fee for ordering the collection data.  The fee is entered as a number, in US Dollars.

Checksum.description: The checksum, usually a SHA1 or md5 checksum for the data file.

umm-cmn-json-schema.json_definitions_Get.description: Represents a Service through a URL where the service will act on data and return the result to the caller.

MimeType.description: The mime type of the service.

FullName.description: The full name of the service.

DataID.description: The data identifier of the data provided by the service. Typically, this is a file name.

DataType.description: The data type of the data provided by the service.

URI.description: The URI of the data provided by the service.

umm-s-json-schema.json_definitions_Conta.description: Method for contacting the service contact. A contact can be available via phone, email, Facebook, or Twitter.

Value.description: This is the contact phone number, email address, Facebook address, or Twitter handle associated with the contact method.

SubsetTypes.description: This element is used to identify the list of supported subsetting requests.

SupportedProjections.description: This element is used to identify the list of supported projections types.

InterpolationTypes.description: This element is used to identify the list of supported interpolation types.

SupportedFormats.description: This project element describes the list of names of the formats supported by the service.

Name.description: The name of the coverage available from the service.

Type.description: The type of the coverage available from the service.

CoverageSpatialExtent.description: The spatial extent of the coverage available from the service. These are coordinate pairs which describe either the point, line string, or polygon representing the spatial extent. The bounding box is described by the west, south, east and north ordinates

SpatialResolution.description: The spatial resolution of the coverage available from the service.

SpatialResolutionUnit.description: The unit of the spatial resolution of the coverage available from the service.

CoverageTemporalExtent.description: The temporal extent of the coverage available from the service.

TemporalResolution.description: The temporal resolution of the coverage available from the service.

TemporalResolutionUnit.description: The unit of the temporal resolution of the coverage available from the service.

RelativePath.description: Path relative to the root universal resource locator for the coverage.

hits.description: The total number of items that matched the search.

took.description: How long the search took in milliseconds from the time the CMR received the request until it had generated the response. This does not include network traffic time to send the request or return the response.

items.description: The list of items matching the result in this page.
